text: Guido Figone (13 October 1927 - 26 November 1998) was an Italian gymnast. He competed at the 1948 Summer Olympics and the 1952 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1927 births Category:1998 deaths Category:Italian male artistic gymnasts Category:Olympic gymnasts of Italy Category:Gymnasts at the 1948 Summer Olympics Category:Gymnasts at the 1952 Summer Olympics Category:People from Chiavari
title: Guido Figone
